description:
A sleek, carry-on-sized travel pack for European tours and RTW adventures. Comfortable shoulder straps and hipbelt make it easy to shoulder your load, and they zip away behind a panel in case you're forced to gate-check. The main compartment opens like a suitcase for easy packing and unpacking, and a dedicated, padded laptop sleeve makes it easy to grab your laptop at airport security or once you reach your seat.

  • Made of durable 200-denier recycled polyester with a reinforced base to withstand the demands of travel
  • AirScape™ breathable back panel transfers the load while maintaining airflow to your back
  • Stowaway harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection when you check your bag
  • Foam-padded shoulder straps and hipbelt have soft, breathable contact surfaces
  • Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry in suitcase mode
  • Large U-shaped zippered main compartment opens completely for easy access
  • Structural sidewalls hold your bag open, making it easy to pack and unload
  • Padded rear-access sleeve holds your 15in. laptop and tablet for quick access at security
  • Lots of interior and exterior pockets keep you organized
  • StraightJacket™ compression system with padded wings and lower panel secures and protects your gear
  • Main compartment and laptop sleeve have lockable zippers
  • Compatible with Osprey Daylite™ and Farpoint™/Fairview™ daypacks
name: Osprey Sojourn 30 Travel Pack - Unisex
